prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Pipe, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
No Piano is present in this song, but Drums, Bass, and Pipe are.

Style 2:
This composition features Drums, Bass, and Pipe, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Bass, and Pipe, with no Piano.
